name: Amazon
description: Global e-commerce and cloud computing company.
summary: Amazon operates online marketplaces and provides cloud infrastructure through AWS.

name: Microsoft
description: Software, cloud, and enterprise technology company.
summary: Microsoft develops operating systems, productivity tools, and Azure cloud services.

name: Google
description: Search engine and internet services company.
summary: Google provides search, advertising, cloud computing, and AI products.

name: Apple
summary: Apple designs iPhones, Macs, and software ecosystems.

name: Meta
description: Social media and virtual reality company.
summary: Meta builds social platforms and invests in VR and metaverse technologies.

name: Netflix
summary: Netflix offers on-demand movies, series, and original content globally.

name: Uber
summary: Uber connects riders and drivers through its global transportation network.

name: Lyft
summary: Lyft provides ride-sharing and micro-mobility services.

name: Slack
summary: Slack enables workplace messaging and collaboration.

name: Atlassian
description: Software development and collaboration tools company.
summary: Atlassian builds Jira, Confluence, and other team productivity tools.

name: Salesforce
summary: Salesforce offers cloud-based CRM and enterprise applications.

name: Adobe
description: Creative and digital media software company.
summary: Adobe develops creative tools like Photoshop and digital marketing solutions.

name: Intel
summary: Intel designs processors and hardware technologies.

name: AMD
description: Semiconductor company producing CPUs and GPUs.
summary: AMD develops processors and graphics cards for computing systems.

name: Qualcomm
summary: Qualcomm designs mobile processors and connectivity solutions.

name: Oracle
description: Enterprise database and cloud computing company.
summary: Oracle provides database software and cloud infrastructure services.

name: SAP
summary: SAP develops enterprise resource planning software.

name: PayPal
summary: PayPal enables digital money transfers and payment services worldwide.

name: Block
description: Financial services and digital payments company.
summary: Block operates Square, Cash App, and other fintech products.

name: Robinhood
summary: Robinhood provides stock and crypto trading for retail investors.

name: Airbus
summary: Airbus designs and manufactures commercial and military aircraft.

name: Boeing
summary: Boeing builds commercial airplanes and defense systems.

name: Shopify
summary: Shopify helps businesses build and scale online stores.

name: Pinterest
summary: Pinterest enables users to discover and save creative ideas.

name: Reddit
summary: Reddit hosts user-generated communities and discussions across topics.

name: ZoomInfo
summary: ZoomInfo provides business contact and data intelligence solutions.

name: ServiceNow
summary: ServiceNow helps enterprises digitize operations and IT workflows.

name: DocuSign
summary: DocuSign enables digital contract signing and agreement management.

name: DoorDash
summary: DoorDash connects consumers with local restaurants and delivery drivers.

name: ByteDance
summary: ByteDance operates content platforms including TikTok.
